text: Yisakale sihamtara dbinaka khela-dhemaliraupe grahana karaichila, arau parthira jirane yisakalaka prataraita karaichila. Eteke aji ami sihamtaka (jahannamata) erai dima, yenekai sihamte sihamtara e'i dinara saksatara babe amala karaa erai dichila, arau (yenekai) sihamte amara ayatasamuhaka asbikara karaichila
